question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. green traffic sign
B. red pickup truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The green traffic sign is in the foreground, mounted on a structure directly above the road and very close to the viewer's perspective, while the red pickup truck is far in the distance on the highway.
